page.title: 02Three Independent Schools
page.content: {Horris Hill Preparatory School. This is a hundred year old Church of England Boarding School for boys aged 8 to 13. There are 160 boys and 20 staff. Latin and Greek,quite rare subjects,are taught.They do most sports except Rugby.Pupils are from London,Merseyside and many foreign countries.{Travel}is by train,cars and aeroplane.{Facilities}include a theatre,sports hall,computer room and swimming pool.The boys take{Common {Entrance and Scholarships}to Eton and other Public Schools. Recently the sports and Computer Room were added and they plan new tennis courts.Sunday Service is compulsory.Uniform is grey corduroy shorts and grey jumpers. {Meals}are from a set menu without choice served at their table.This is a traditional,highly academic school, with a national reputation.
